name: Portal Panic!
description:
CONTROLS:
Arrows keys - move
Up arrow - enter portal
Z - jump

A demo of a game I'm working on called Portal Panic! Where you play as... actually I haven't given the main character a name yet, leave some suggestions in the comments, and you have to go through portals to find a way back home. the game is incredibly unpolished and is currently more of a proof-of-concept, but I'm releasing it anyway because.... idk

Everything in this game is by me, except for the falling sound effect at the very beginning, (which is from Sonic 3,) and the time travel effect (which is from Sonic CD)

Music made in Deflemask
Graphics made in Piskel

Can't control the game? try clicking the game window a few times.
